series.title: Sales Gravy: Jeb Blount
series.author: Jeb Blount | Author of People Buy You

episodes.title: Virtual Sales Kickoff 2017 - Un-Cut
episodes.author: Jeb Blount
episodes.summary: The most pressing issues facing sales professionals and sales leaders are, Prospecting, Pipeline, & Productivity. In this exclusive re-broadcast of VSKO17, four of the world's most cutting edge thought leaders, shatter modern day sales productivity myths that are holding you back and give you their secrets for making  2017 (and beyond) your best year ever.

episodes.title: Eat the Frog - The Real Secret to Timing Prospecting Calls
episodes.author: Jeb Blount
episodes.summary: On this episode I answer the number one question I get about prospecting and give you the secret to timing your telephone prospecting calls. Be sure to pick up my new book - Sales EQ - today.

episodes.title: Next Steps and Micro-Commitments
episodes.author: Jeb Blount
episodes.summary: Stalled deals are the bane of the sales profession. The number one reason why deals stall is the failure to get to the next step. On this episode, Anthony Iannarino and I discuss the keys to getting micro-commitments and to the next step.

episodes.title: To Buy is Human
episodes.author: Jeb Blount
episodes.summary: People buy on emotion and justify with logic. To reach ultra-high levels of performance, it is incumbent on salespeople to understand how emotion impacts buying decisions.

episodes.title: Influencing and Persuading With Stories
episodes.author: Jeb Blount
episodes.summary: What is the most persuasive communication style in sales? How to you draw your prospects in and keep their attention during sales calls and presentations? I answer these questions and more on this episode when I speak with my Paul Smith, the author of Sell With a Story.

episodes.title: Sales Drive and Ultra-High Performance
episodes.author: Jeb Blount
episodes.summary: On this episode I discuss how Sales Drive, and the components of Sales Drive - optimism, competitiveness, and need for achievement - separates ultra-high sales performers from average salespeople.

episodes.title: The 3 Questions that Matter Most in 2017
episodes.author: Jeb Blount
episodes.summary: Happy New Year! With the slate wiped clean and the future unwritten, there are only three questions that matter. How you answer them will determine where you stand next year at the cusp of 2018.

episodes.title: Accelerating Sales with LinkedIn
episodes.author: Jeb Blount
episodes.summary: On this episode I discuss LinkedIn tips and techniques that will help you find better leads and close more deals with social selling expert, Kurt Shaver.

episodes.title: 4 Keys to Engaging Prospects With Cold Email
episodes.author: Jeb Blount
episodes.summary: On this episode I disucss cold email prospecting techniques with Kendra Lee, author of The Sales Magnet and one of the top experts on email prospecting.
